metadata.title: CVE-2023-3863 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in nfc_llcp_find_local innet/nfc/llcp_core.c in NFC in the Linux kernel. This flaw allows a localuser with special privileges to impact a kernel information leak issue.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
